ModMetaData.name: Pusheen in Rimworld
ModMetaData.author: Jayemouse
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds Pusheen into the game as a type of wild animal, with a very rare spawn chance. You can finally fulfill your dream of having Pusheen as your space colony pet!
"Isn't Rimworld a bit too dark for a cute little cat like Pusheen?" - Yeah, probably, but that's a problem for your pawns.
